name: nextbucket
description: CustomStorageBucket is a scalable and flexible cloud storage solution designed to handle file uploads, management, and retrieval for your web and mobile applications. It serves as a comprehensive storage service, providing secure, high-performance, and easy-to-use file storage capabilities. The service is built to support a wide range of file types, including images, videos, and documents, making it an ideal choice for applications that require robust file management features.
author: anonymous
